description: What it does is maps /api/v1/products. So now to access the products(i.e. http://localhost:<port value>/products) i have to make the url like this: http://localhost:<port value>/api/v1/products. In short i have to add the extra 2 routes? to the path of the URL.
description2: The above adds a new route with a predifined filter in place. When i type /products/electronics i get all products whose category is electronics.
